meanings.sent1: The ball was outthrown by the pitcher.
meanings.sent2: She outthrown the old clothes to make space for new ones.
meanings.sent3: The cat outthrown the toy mouse and chased after it.
meanings.sent4: His words outthrown into the air, never to be taken back.
meanings.sent5: The paper airplane was outthrown with great force across the room.

meanings.sent1: The outthrown book lay forgotten on the dusty shelf.
meanings.sent2: The outthrown garbage bags filled the alley behind the house.
meanings.sent3: The outthrown seeds sprouted unexpectedly in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her outthrown dreams floated away like dandelion seeds in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The outthrown ball bounced down the hill, out of reach.
